Articles.Content:
With these new Kerbodyne parts, I decided to fly an Apollo-like mission. It isn't a perfect representation... the rocket isn't a perfect Saturn-V, and my Munar insertion didn't come in retrograde. But still, a solid proof of concept.

Completely stock, save for KER for Delta-V calculations. Overall, the construction was somewhat simplistic; the entire rocket has a whole 62 parts.

Here's some mission pics. Enjoy!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
I made a really similar rocket, maybe because we are trying to recreate the same rocket
Haha, very nice! Great minds think alike, eh?
